description:
• Designed and implemented A/B and multivariate tests using Javascript, Convert, Kameleoon, ABTasty etc to evaluate UI/UX changes aimed at increasing user engagement and revenue.

  • Collaborated with product, design, and analytics teams to identify test hypotheses and translate them into measurable front-end experiments.

  • Increased revenue by 8% through the successful implementation of A/B tests that improved the user interaction with cta to add to the cart.

  • Integrated analytics and event tracking (e.g. with Google Analytics) to ensure accurate interpretation of test results.

1. Recoup Health (Jun 2024 - Nov 2024)

  • Refactored key modules of a patient-facing web application using React and TailwindCSS, improving performance and maintainability.

  • Developed an image optimization middleware in Express.js to compress images before uploading to AWS S3, reducing upload time and storage costs.

  • Led the front-end development of the EPH Report product using React and TypeScript, aligning closely with the UX / UI teams for pixel-perfect implementations.

2. Magicpin (Sept 2023 - Jun 2024)

  • Built and maintained event-driven web applications using React.js, integrating with REST APIs via Axios for real-time data handling.

  • Developed a dynamic, slug-based system for mall and society listings using Next.js, Express.js, and MongoDB (Mongoose), enabling SEO-friendly and scalable content delivery.

  • Created a responsive career portal with admin panel functionalities, integrated Google Authentication, and implemented application management workflows using Next.js and MongoDB.
